message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $115?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but $115 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $105. Can you consider that?
